title: George Washington Birthplace National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Rappahannock Indian Heritage Day  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Rappahannock Indian Heritage Day  The event is still occurring today, but due to the high heat and humidity there may be some modifications made to the schedule of events. Please speak with a ranger at the Visitor Center desk for up to date information.
